C

checkAccess(String) - Method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Authorisation
Method which checks if an account has access to the warehouse, restaurant or driver If an account does not have access, it will be unable to use the restricted functionality
checkAccess(String, String) - Static method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Authorisation
Overloaded checkAccess method for internal backend use
checkWorkLocation(String, String) - Method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Authorisation
method to check the work location for the accounts
compare(String, String) - Method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Restaurant
Compares two dates and selects the latest.
connect(String, String, String) - Static method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.tools.DbConnection
Method to allow users to establish a connection to the database Users input a username,password and url, all of type string If successful, the system will show "Database connection established" and connect to the server If it fails, the system will show "JDBC driver not found" or "Database connection error" or "Unrecognised exception encountered"
CorsFilter - Class in org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources
CorsFilter class which implements the ContainerResponseFilter.
CorsFilter() - Constructor for class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.CorsFilter
 
createMeal(String, String, String) - Method in class org.team2.cluk.backend.webresources.Restaurant
This method creates a meal within a restaurant Users are required to input the item and the quantity needed to create the meal The system will check whether the quantity of the item is below the minimum stock.
